db09be3b-8774-4adc-8d05-5b82e1122b55.description: This etiquette course will teach you empowering Communication, Etiquette, and Image lifestyle skills. So, you will become polished and poised in any situation. Therefore, creating an excellent impression for yourself and the organization.

95d178cf-df34-4dab-96df-8e86f1207677.description: This course is designed to study fundamental principles, elements, and practices in effective Business Communication. Students will develop vital communication skills through group discussion, instruction, practice, and application, for improved dialogue in the workplace among co-workers, team leads, and upper management.
95d178cf-df34-4dab-96df-8e86f1207677.name: Business Communication

issuer.summary: issued by Inland Empire Institute of Technology and Business

entity.name: Inland Empire Institute of Technology and Business

skills.name: Demonstration of effective interpersonal communication skills that reflect understanding, appreciation, and respect for diverse perspectives and cultures.
Understanding how to effectively communicate through oral and written communication

7445f8c6-c1e9-4f86-b320-702e1e76a513.description: This course analyzes the symbiotic relationship between leadership and decision making, combining classical wisdom, recent research, and theory and practice to teach leadership and decision-making skills. Throughout the course we focus on leadership and decision making in the business world, politics and in one's personal life. We use a mix of reading, discussion, case studies, team exercises, and reflective exercises to achieve a better understanding of leadership and decision making.
7445f8c6-c1e9-4f86-b320-702e1e76a513.name: Introduction to Leadership

Students will exercise an understanding of the fundamental ways leadership is practiced in on-going organizations
Students will increase self-awareness by exploring and articulating components of leader identity, and preparing a presentation about personal values

skills.name: • Arrange page layouts, use multiple insert options, and print or save as pdf.

• Know how to use Ribbon, Quick Access Toolbar, and backstage view to produce Word documents.
• Set up collaboration and reviewing features to share and protect documents.

599fc8d9-2426-41d4-89a2-44f40eab4626.description: This course allows students to have the ability to understand and properly apply financial management skills like managing debt, understanding budgeting, credit building and effective forward planning.

skills.name: Have a better knowledge of budgeting, spending, debt management and many other topics for improved financial decisions.
Learn to manage your finances by saving, investing and creating a foundation for success. Learn investment basics.
Learn to protect your money, yourself and your family by understanding insurance and taxes.
Learn uncomplicated, tried and true methods for building stability and creating spending plans and building credit.
